column2: Shortly after the Dwarfs lost control of the hold, Ugma and his band of River Trolls made their home in its underground reservoir. Here they lived tormenting local adventurers and any other stupid enough to cross them, this was until Gorgal and Gorfang invaded and conquered their homes. Ugma and his tribe are determined reclaim their home and treasure and smash in those rotten greenskins who humiliated them.
